trans-unit.source: Planning and Implementation
trans-unit.target: Planning and Implementation

trans-unit.source: Title: SAP NetWeaver on Azure Virtual Machines – Planning and Implementation Guide
trans-unit.target: Title: SAP NetWeaver on Azure Virtual Machines – Planning and Implementation Guide

trans-unit.source: Summary: This is the paper to start with if you are thinking about running SAP NetWeaver in Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: Summary: This is the paper to start with if you are thinking about running SAP NetWeaver in Azure Virtual Machines.

trans-unit.source: This planning and implementation guide will help you evaluate whether an existing or planned SAP NetWeaver-based system can be deployed to an Azure Virtual Machines environment.
trans-unit.target: This planning and implementation guide will help you evaluate whether an existing or planned SAP NetWeaver-based system can be deployed to an Azure Virtual Machines environment.

trans-unit.source: It covers multiple SAP NetWeaver deployment scenarios, and includes SAP configurations that are specific to Azure.
trans-unit.target: It covers multiple SAP NetWeaver deployment scenarios, and includes SAP configurations that are specific to Azure.

trans-unit.source: The paper lists and describes all the necessary configuration information you’ll need on the SAP/Azure side to run a hybrid SAP landscape.
trans-unit.target: The paper lists and describes all the necessary configuration information you’ll need on the SAP/Azure side to run a hybrid SAP landscape.

trans-unit.source: Measures you can take to ensure high availability of SAP NetWeaver-based systems on IaaS are also covered.
trans-unit.target: Measures you can take to ensure high availability of SAP NetWeaver-based systems on IaaS are also covered.

trans-unit.source: Updated: August 2015
trans-unit.target: Updated: August 2015

trans-unit.source: Download this guide now
trans-unit.target: Download this guide now

trans-unit.source: Deployment
trans-unit.target: Deployment

trans-unit.source: Title: SAP NetWeaver on Azure Virtual Machines – Deployment Guide
trans-unit.target: Title: SAP NetWeaver on Azure Virtual Machines – Deployment Guide

trans-unit.source: Summary: This document provides procedural guidance for deploying SAP NetWeaver software to virtual machines in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Summary: This document provides procedural guidance for deploying SAP NetWeaver software to virtual machines in Azure.

trans-unit.source: This paper focuses on three specific deployment scenarios, with an emphasis on enabling the Azure Monitoring Extensions for SAP, including troubleshooting recommendations for the Azure Monitoring Extensions for SAP.
trans-unit.target: This paper focuses on three specific deployment scenarios, with an emphasis on enabling the Azure Monitoring Extensions for SAP, including troubleshooting recommendations for the Azure Monitoring Extensions for SAP.

trans-unit.source: This paper assumes that you’ve read the planning and implementation guide.
trans-unit.target: This paper assumes that you’ve read the planning and implementation guide.

trans-unit.source: Updated: September 2015
trans-unit.target: Updated: September 2015

trans-unit.source: Download this guide now
trans-unit.target: Download this guide now

trans-unit.source: SAP DBMS on Azure
trans-unit.target: SAP DBMS on Azure

trans-unit.source: Title: SAP DBMS in Azure Deployment Guide
trans-unit.target: Title: SAP DBMS in Azure Deployment Guide

trans-unit.source: Summary: This paper covers planning and implementation considerations for the DBMS systems that should run in conjunction with SAP.
trans-unit.target: Summary: This paper covers planning and implementation considerations for the DBMS systems that should run in conjunction with SAP.

trans-unit.source: In the first part, general considerations are listed and presented.
trans-unit.target: In the first part, general considerations are listed and presented.

trans-unit.source: The following parts of the paper relate to deployments of different DBMS in Azure that are supported by SAP.
trans-unit.target: The following parts of the paper relate to deployments of different DBMS in Azure that are supported by SAP.

trans-unit.source: Different DBMS presented are SQL Server, SAP ASE, Oracle, SAP MaxDB and IBM DB2 for Linux, Unix and Windows.
trans-unit.target: Different DBMS presented are SQL Server, SAP ASE, Oracle, SAP MaxDB and IBM DB2 for Linux, Unix and Windows.

trans-unit.source: In those specific parts considerations you have to account for when you are running SAP systems on Azure in conjunction with those DBMS are discussed.
trans-unit.target: In those specific parts considerations you have to account for when you are running SAP systems on Azure in conjunction with those DBMS are discussed.

trans-unit.source: Subjects like backup and high availability methods that are supported by the different DBMS on Azure are presented for the usage with SAP applications.
trans-unit.target: Subjects like backup and high availability methods that are supported by the different DBMS on Azure are presented for the usage with SAP applications.

trans-unit.source: Updated: December 2015
trans-unit.target: Updated: December 2015

trans-unit.source: Download this guide now
trans-unit.target: Download this guide now

trans-unit.source: SAP NetWeaver on Azure
trans-unit.target: SAP NetWeaver on Azure

trans-unit.source: Title: SAP NetWeaver - Building an Azure based Disaster Recovery Solution
trans-unit.target: Title: SAP NetWeaver - Building an Azure based Disaster Recovery Solution

trans-unit.source: Summary:This document provides a step-by-step guidance for building an Azure based Disaster Recovery solution for SAP NetWeaver.
trans-unit.target: Summary:This document provides a step-by-step guidance for building an Azure based Disaster Recovery solution for SAP NetWeaver.

trans-unit.source: The solution described assumes that the SAP landscape is running virtualized on-premise based on Hyper-V.
trans-unit.target: The solution described assumes that the SAP landscape is running virtualized on-premise based on Hyper-V.

trans-unit.source: In the first part of the document Azure Site Recovery (ASR) services are introduced in its components.
trans-unit.target: In the first part of the document Azure Site Recovery (ASR) services are introduced in its components.

trans-unit.source: The second part of the document describes specifics for SAP NetWeaver based landscapes.
trans-unit.target: The second part of the document describes specifics for SAP NetWeaver based landscapes.

trans-unit.source: Possibilities of using ASR with SAP NetWeaver application instances and SAP Central Services are discussed and described.
trans-unit.target: Possibilities of using ASR with SAP NetWeaver application instances and SAP Central Services are discussed and described.

trans-unit.source: A focus of the second part is leveraging ASR for SAP Central Services which are protected with windows Server Failover Cluster configurations.
trans-unit.target: A focus of the second part is leveraging ASR for SAP Central Services which are protected with windows Server Failover Cluster configurations.

trans-unit.source: Updated: September 2015
trans-unit.target: Updated: September 2015

trans-unit.source: Download this guide now
trans-unit.target: Download this guide now
